#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <vector>
#include <stack>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
	int t, n, i, flag;
	char ch;

	scanf("%d", &t );

	while( t-- ) {

		string s, str = "";
		stack<char> S;

		cin >> s;
		n = s.length();

		for( i = 0;i < n;i++ ) {

			if( s[ i ] >= 'a' && s[ i ] <= 'z' )
				str += s[ i ];
			else if( s[ i ] == ')' ) {

				flag = 1;
				ch = S.top();

				while( ch != '(' && !S.empty() ) {

					str += ch;
					S.pop();

					if( !S.empty() )
						ch = S.top();
					else {
						flag = 0;
						break;
					}
				}
				if( flag )
					S.pop();
			}
			else
				S.push( s[ i ] );
		}
	
		cout << str << endl;
	}


	return 0;
}
